name: Kickin' Collard Greens
author: Ken Adams
summary: If you like greens you will love this recipe.  The bacon and onions give them a wonderful flavor.  Add more red pepper for a little more spice.
ingredients: 1 pound fresh collard greens, cut into 2-inch pieces
directions: Heat oil in a large pot over medium-high heat
Add bacon, and cook until crisp
Remove bacon from pan, crumble and return to the pan
Add onion, and cook until tender, about 5 minutes
Add garlic, and cook until just fragrant
Add  , and fry until they start to wilt
Pour in chicken broth, and season with salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes
Reduce heat to low, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes, or until greens are tender
